searchQueries.title: Search queries
searchQueries.description: Queries to search LinkedIn profile. The same query as you would use in the LinkedIn search bar.

locations.title: Locations Filter
locations.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn locations. Example: `San Francisco Bay Area`.

geoIds.title: Geo IDs Filter
geoIds.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn geo IDs. Example: `103644278`.

company.title: Company Filter
company.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn companies.

companyUrls.title: Company URLs Filter
companyUrls.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn company URLs. Example: `https://www.linkedin.com/company/google`.

companyPublicIdentifiers.title: Company Public Identifiers Filter (last part in the URL)
companyPublicIdentifiers.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn company public identifiers. Example: `google`.

companyIds.title: Company IDs Filter
companyIds.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn company IDs. Example: `1441`.

school.title: School Filter
school.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn schools. Example: `Stanford University`.

schoolUrls.title: School URLs Filter
schoolUrls.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn school URLs. Example: `https://www.linkedin.com/school/stanford-university`.

schoolPublicIdentifiers.title: School Public Identifiers Filter (last part in the URL)
schoolPublicIdentifiers.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn school public identifiers. Example: `stanford-university`.

schoolIds.title: School IDs Filter
schoolIds.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn school IDs. Example: `1234`.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of profiles to scrape per each search query input
maxItems.description: Maximum number of profiles to scrape per each search query input.
